name: py-sphinx-toolbox

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.

dependencies.name: py-apeye
dependencies.description: Handy tools for working with URLs and APIs.

dependencies.name: py-autodocsumm
dependencies.description: Extended sphinx autodoc including automatic autosummaries.

dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4
dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.

dependencies.name: py-cachecontrol
dependencies.description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.

dependencies.name: py-dict2css
dependencies.description:
A μ-library for constructing cascading style sheets from Python
dictionaries.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-domdf-python-tools
dependencies.description: Helpful functions for Python

dependencies.name: py-html5lib
dependencies.description: HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification.

dependencies.name: py-lockfile
dependencies.description:
The lockfile package exports a LockFile class which provides a simple
API for locking files. Unlike the Windows msvcrt.locking function, the
fcntl.lockf and flock functions, and the deprecated posixfile module,
the API is identical across both Unix (including Linux and Mac) and
Windows platforms. The lock mechanism relies on the atomic nature of the
link (on Unix) and mkdir (on Windows) system calls. An implementation
based on SQLite is also provided, more as a demonstration of the
possibilities it provides than as production-quality code.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-sphinx
dependencies.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx-autodoc-typehints
dependencies.description: Type hints (PEP 484) support for the Sphinx autodoc extension

dependencies.name: py-sphinx-jinja2-compat
dependencies.description: Patches Jinja2 v3 to restore compatibility with earlier Sphinx versions.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx-prompt
dependencies.description: Sphinx directive to add unselectable prompt.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx-tabs
dependencies.description: Create tabbed content in Sphinx documentation when building HTML.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-typing-inspect
dependencies.description: Runtime inspection utilities for typing module.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-whey
dependencies.description: A simple Python wheel builder for simple projects.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: py-pyomo
dependent_to.description:
Pyomo is a Python-based open-source software package that supports a
diverse set of optimization capabilities for formulating and analyzing
optimization models.
